body_html:
@martinwicke: DId you read the question or did you just ignore it?
@girving: Why did you close the question without a clear response?

Tensorflow is not written in a pedagogical manner but rather a opaque manner. This should change with some paper references and a glossary section so people can drill-down on the vocab with sources cited. I cannot believe that an open-source project would have two unrelated responses to my question in the last three months. Where have the Tensorflow developers gone?
